string.name: name
string.value: Tourist Site: A Wild Monkey Mess
#p9000078#, the #b#m950100000##k PR Manager, seems to be encountering some problems. Talk to #b#p9000078##k.

#p9000078# says that the number of #t4000561#s being thrown away by the #o9500383#s are becoming a nuisance for tourists visiting the #m950100000#. Help #p9000078# by eliminating #r100 #o9500383#s#k and gathering #b50 #t4000561#s#k. You can enter the Monkey Temple by talking to #b#p9000080##k.

#i4000561# #t4000561# #b#c4000561# / 50#k
#o9500383##r #a105821##k

Even though you eliminated the #o9500383#s and cleaned up the #t4000561#s, the #m950100000# still doesn't seem very clean. #p9000078# plans on continuing his clean-up of the place and asks that you come see him #bafter 1 hour#k, if you'd like to help.

Geez! I can't seem to do anything because of those stupid monkeys! I should have gotten rid of them a long time ago! Why are the village elders so against it? ...Oh, welcome to the #m950100000#! Location guide? Lost and Found? Local product purchase? I have everything you need. What can I help you with?

Is there a problem? Oh, it's not that big of a deal. It's just that the #o9500383#s are giving me a headache. Many tourists visiting the #m950100000# have been slipping on the #t4000561#s they've been throwing all over the place.

After turning this place into a tourist attraction and even asking #p9010010# to publicize it, I'm finally starting to see some tourists coming in. But these monkeys are ruining everything! I wanted to rid them from this place, but the village is against it... Sigh, it'd be nice to have some help with this.
You'd really want to help me? You're that confident, eh? Well, I'll take all the help I can get! Please eliminate #r100 #o9500383#s#k and bring back #b50 #t4000561#s.
They should be in the Monkey Temple near the Golden Temple. You'll be able to enter by bringing a Golden Ticket to #b#p9000080##k. Thank you!
Not up for it, eh? I guess people only do things for rewards nowadays.
You defeated the #o9500383#s and brought the #t4000561#s! Alright! The #m950100000# certainly looks a bit cleaner, thanks to you! I wish I had something to give you in return...

Despite all that you've done, there still seems to be a lot of #t4000561#s lying around. There are just too many #o9500383#s! If you would like to help me out again, can you come see me #bin 1 hour#k?

Have you not eliminated the #o9500383#s yet? If you defeat #r100 #o9500383#s#k and collect #b50 #t4000561#s#k that they've thrown away, the #m950100000# is sure to look spick and span! Please go see #b#p9000080##k to enter the Monkey Temple.
